channel.title: Art Works on Jun-Liszt Li
channel.description: Recent content in Art Works on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: Photos
item.description: Art works By Jun-Liszt Li …… With Scientific Giants With Victor Robert Ambros (Middle), During Professor Victor gave a talk at Charles University, at Prague, Czech Republic, 08/2025 Dr. Victor Ambros discovered the first known microRNA (miRNA) and is laureate of the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine (2024). With Zhijian (James) Chen (Right), During Professor James was awarded the Paul Ehrlich and Ludwig Darmstaedter Prize for 2025, at Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 04/2025
